sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"著名的，知名的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: famous, noted, prominent, outstanding, notorious, eminent, notable
means: famous ： 是普通用词，指传播很广，引起人们注意的人或事物。
noted ： 多指因成绩卓著而备受注意的专家或权威及其著作，有时含贬义。
prominent ： 指出人头地，为公众所熟悉，至少在地方上闻名。
outstanding ： 侧重指因素质优良，功绩卓著而超过同类的人或物，强调"突出"。
notorious ： 指因劣迹而臭名昭著，含强烈贬义；但有时也作"众所周知的"解。
eminent ： 指在某方面杰出卓越或突出的人或物。
notable ： 用于指事件时，侧重其重要、值得注意；用于指人时，与famous同义，但语气较弱。

sentence.Network_en: His stomach had grown more prominent with every passing year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的肚子一年比一年鼓。

sentence.Network_en: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
sentence.Network_cn: 花园里，苹果树和梨树患枯枝病最明显。

sentence.Network_en: Political trials were being used to keep prominent activists out of circulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过对著名活动家进行政治审判使其从公众视线中消失。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'projecting'): from Latin prominent- 'jutting out', from the verb prominere. Compare with eminent

entry.def: Someone who is prominent is important.

example.ex: ...a prominent member of the Law Society.
...the children of very prominent or successful parents.
example.tran: 杰出或成功人士的孩子

entry.tran: 显著的；突出的；鲜艳的；引人注目的
entry.def: Something that is prominent is very noticeable or is an important part of something else.

example.ex: Here the window plays a prominent part in the design.
example.tran: 这里窗户在设计中起着非常重要的作用。
罗马尼亚最著名的独立报纸

means.word_mean: 1. having a quality that thrusts itself into attention;

sentences.sentence: "an outstanding fact of our time is that nations poisoned by anti semitism proved less fortunate in regard to their own freedom"
"a new theory is the most prominent feature of the book"
"a striking thing about Picadilly Circus is the statue of Eros in the center"
"a striking resemblance between parent and child"

Sentence.sentence: It is the most prominent example of a huge new "sharing economy", in which people rent beds, cars, boats and other assets directly from each other, co-ordinated via the internet.

sentences.en: Our house is the most prominent one in the street; it's painted red.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子是街上最突出的, 它被漆成了红色。

sentences.en: A single tree in a field is prominent.
sentences.cn: 田野中独立的一棵树是极为明显的。

means.word_mean: 杰出的, 著名的, 卓越的

sentences.cn: 他是科学界杰出的人物。

jushi.english: Our house is the most prominent one in the street; it's painted red.
jushi.chinese: 我们的房子是街上最突出的,它被漆成红色。
